title: Quick survey about Indian school
selftext:
Hi all! I was wondering if any of you who are or have recently attended school recently could answer a quick survey, which would help me complete my english assignment. It's anonymous and should take a maximum of around 4 minutes. Thank you so much for considering!

[https://forms.gle/2naVtRyAop1T4tRN7](https://forms.gle/2naVtRyAop1T4tRN7)
